page.title: 03SEVERNVALE GARDEN CENTRE
page.content: The Garden Centre is situated in Milbury heath and it is visited by six to eight hundred customers weekly during Spring, Summer and Autumn and two hundred in the Winter. Interest in gardening has increased recently as people have more leisure time. The most popular purchases are shrubs, house plants and fertilizers. The centre also sells gardening equipment, sheds, greenhouses, garden furniture, patios and swimming pools. There is a small cafe for light refreshments. We spoke to forty four customers and found that 80% of them had travelled between five and nineteen miles to shop. About 50% enjoy gardening as a hobby. They visit the centre frequently, mainly to buy shrubs and trees. Deliveries are made over a large area, as far as Midsomer Norton and Gloucester.
